      • read

        public void read(byte[] bytes,
        int bytesOffset,
        int length,
        long storageIndex)
          throws IOException
        Description copied from class: RandomAccessStorageModule
        Copies bytes from storage to the passed byte array.
        Specified by:
        read in interface IStorageModule
        Overrides:
        read in class RandomAccessStorageModule
        Parameters:
        bytes - the array into which the data will be copied
        bytesOffset - the position of the first byte in bytes, which will be filled with data from storage
        length - the number of bytes to copy
        storageIndex - the position of the first byte to be copied
        Throws:
        IOException

        Overrides:
        write in class RandomAccessStorageModule
        Parameters:
        bytes - the source of the data to be stored
        bytesOffset - offset of the first byte to be stored
        length - the number of bytes to be copied
        storageIndex - byte offset in the storage area
        Throws:
        IOException
